text: Soni namuno (achimakafilio) tungaatuluchisye Malaika (kwisa kuwichila umboni yautume wenu), nombe wawe nikwawechetekasya (pakwagumbalichisya umboni), ni kwasonganganyichisya chindu chilichose pameso pao, nganganawa wanti nikulupilila ikaweje Allah ali asachile, nambo kuti wajinji mwa wanganyao ali muujinga
